title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3808/81 of 21 December 1981 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2358/71 on the common organization of the market in seeds, (EEC) No 2727/75 on the common organization of the market in cereals and (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 3808/81 of 21 December 1981 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2358/71 on the common organization of the market in seeds, (EEC) No 2727/75 on the common organization of the market in cereals and (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 2358/71 is hereby amended as follows:    1. Article 1 shall be replaced by the following: >PIC FILE= "T0021291">
2. Article 8a (1) shall be replaced by the following:
"1. The Common Customs Tariff rates of dutyshall be applied to the products named inArticle 1.";  (1) Opinion delivered on 17 December 1981 (not yet published in the Official Journal). (2) Opinion delivered on 25 November 1981 (not yet published in the Official Journal). (3) OJ No L 246, 5.11.1971, p. 1. (4) OJ No L 281, 1.11.1975, p. 1. (5) OJ No L 198, 20.7.1981, p. 2. (6) OJ No L 172, 27.7.1968, p. 1. (7) OJ No L 335, 23.11.1981, p. 1.
3. the Annex shall be replaced by Annex I to thisRegulation.
The Annex "Common Customs Tariff" to Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 shall be amended in accordance with Annex II to this Regulation.
Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 2727/75 shall be replaced by the following: >PIC FILE= "T0021292">  >PIC FILE= "T0021293">

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 February 1982.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1981.
For the Council
The President
N. RIDLEY
ANNEX I
>PIC FILE= "T0021294">
ANNEX II
The Common Customs Tariff is amended as indicated below:    1. Additional Note 1 to Chapter 10 shall be replaced by the following:
"1. The term "durum wheat", as used in subheading 10.01 B II, shall be taken tomean wheat of the "triticum durum" species and the hybrids derived from theinterspecific crossing of "triticum durum" with the same number of chromosomesas that species. Durum wheat thus defined must be of a colour rangingfrom amber yellow to brown and show a translucent horn-like vitreous fracture."
2. Heading No 10.01 shall be replaced by the following: >PIC FILE= "T0021295">
